DOC.brief_summary: For Cardiopulmonary Resuscitation ( CPR ) education , depth chest compression important teaching point . However , tool feedback depth chest compression like Resusci Annie Skill Reporter ( Laedal Medical AS , Norway ) helpful expensive use widely . In day , smartphone free application measure depth chest compression real-time . This study assess validity depth chest compression smartphone application , PocketCPR , three site smartphone arm hand . 1. grap hand , 2. fix upper arm arm band , 3. grap hand arm band To analyze difference Skill Reporter manikin PocketCPR application , investigator use Intraclass Correlation Coefficient ( ICC ) statistical method .
DOC.brief_title: Assessment Validity Depth PocketCPR Sites Smartphone Arm
DOC.criteria: Chest compressor Basic Life Support certification Physician , Nurse , Emergency medical technician 3 year clinical experience Person practice normal chest compression reason
